column2: UPDATE 2-Amazon's Bezos rescued by Ecuador Navy due to kidney stone CHICAGO/QUITO
column3: Jan 4 Amazon.com founder Jeff Bezos was airlifted from a cruise ship by the Ecuadorean Navy after suffering a kidney stone attack in the Galapagos Islands on New Year's Day.
